entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy overnight with 70 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 70 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
